features: 5 BLADES FOR A LASTING SMOOTH: The razor's 5 diamond-like coated blades, bring a soft, smooth glide to every stroke, to give you a close shave that lasts, and are designed to resist rust

FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: This female razor has a SkinElixir lubrastrip with a touch of Aloe Vera for glide, to deliver an extra smooth shave that lasts, with up to 0% irritation (US Consumer Study Feb 2018). Dermatologically recommended for sensitive skin
10X MORE LUBRICATION FOR PROTECTION: The water-activated ribbon of moisture provides 10x* more lubrication to guard your skin against nicks, cuts and irritation. *vs Simply3 Sensitive
30 DAYS OF SMOOTH SHAVES: Each blade refill lasts up to 30 days of smooth shaves (based on twice/week shave)
GENTLY EFFECTIVE: The razor's diamond-like coated blades bring a soft, smooth glide to every stroke, for 100% smooth skin. Shave right, not more
body.description: Venus female razor blades are designed with a woman’s body in mind. From handles designed for a comfortable grip to pivoting heads that contour to your body, Venus razors are designed to help reveal touchably smooth skin. Venus Deluxe Smooth Sensitive women’s blade refills are perfect for protecting your sensitive skin. These razor blades feature 5 diamond-like coated blades for a long-lasting smooth shave and a SkinElixir lubrastrip with a touch of Aloe Vera for glide that releases a perfect dose of protection you can feel with up to 0% irritation*. The SkinElixir lubrastrip activates when wet, providing your sensitive skin with a perfect dose of protection from nicks, cuts and irritation while shaving. The blade refills for women also feature a pivoting head that adjusts to your curves, including ankles and knees. No awkwardly angling your razor. Its platinum metal handle is designed to last so you can be in total control and keeping the handle for 5 years vs 1 year equals 80% less waste so that you can get the most out of your shave. Enjoy a smooth and close shave with a razor that really understands your sensitive skin. Each blade refill lasts up to 30 days of smooth shaves (based on twice/week shave); just use and replace when you're ready for a new one. Did you know that any Venus blade refill fits any Venus razor handle (except Simply Venus and Venus Pubic Hair Razor)? The handle is designed to last so you only need to change your blades

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: FINALLY a women’s razor that’s a competitor against the men’s!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shaver I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm 48 years old, and I look like I'm in my mid 30s (been told so). I want to keep looking young (LOL). I have super sensitive skin & shaving has always been problematic for me because of this, therefore, EVERY shaver I've used since I was 11-12 has been problematic. I've even used shaving gel for sensitive skin, but that doesn't work. I saw this on sale at Walgreens & thought well, it's a Venus, must be good, so I'll give it a try. BUY IT. BEST I'VE EVER USED. TRUST ME. Oh, the shaving gel I use is Skintimate Coconut Delight. (I'm obsessed with anything coconut.) I don't care if it's gonna cost me $20 reg price, it's worth it for years of shaving cuts & problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gets the job done and does not leave hair behind. No need to go over the same spot multiple times to remove hair. Would like more quantity for the price but would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET THIS RNNNNN
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loooooove this. It has a moisture bar which actually works and hydrates as you shave. Its so flawless and im in love. Worth all the money.
